text: Fairuza Balk (born Fairuza Alejandra Feldthouse, May 21, 1974) is an American movie actress. She was especially active in the 1990s. She acted in the movies The Waterboy, American History X and many others. Balk was born in Point Reyes, California. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Marin County, California Category:1974 births Category:Living people
title: Fairuza Balk
